pages.title: Relishes
pages.text: {b Relishes} are the foremost properties of beverages. They determine what {(beverages_basics/sways)Sways} could a beverage bear.

The liquid ingredients of a beverage, that is, the “bases” added to the {(mechanisms/whisk)whisk}, are bound to specific Relishes respectively. A beverage typically accept at most five portions of bases, and {u up to two} Relishe(s) that are most-presented in the bases become the Relishe(s) of the beverage.

For example, milk is bound to the Relish {cereal Ceres}, and tea, {bath Minerva}. If two portions of milk and three portions of tea are added to a whisk, the resulting beverage will have the sole Relish {bath Minerva}.

pages.title: Relishes and Sways
pages.text: To add a {(beverages_basics/sways)Sway} to a beverage, it is usually required that the beverage has a certain relish. For example, the {i Jump Boost} Sway only takes effect if the beverage has {bath Minerva} as a relish.
There are currently six relished provided by Convivium, as listed below.

pages.name: Ceres
pages.desc: {b The relish of} {cereal Ceres}, or {b Cereal}, is associated with the natural powers that preserve and nourish.

pages.name: Liber
pages.desc: {b The relish of} {wine Liber}, or {b Wine}, is associated with peril, changes, and possibilities.

pages.name: Minerva
pages.desc: {b The relish of} {bath Minerva}, or {b Bath}, is associated with the enthusiasm towards adventures and knowledge.

pages.name: Vertumnus
pages.desc: {b The relish of} {seasons Vertumnus}, or {b Seasons}, is associated the rules that circulate time, and stimulate sensations.

pages.name: Vesta
pages.desc: {b The relish of} {hearth Vesta}, or {b Hearth}, is associated with the persistence and fortitude that defuse crises.

pages.name: Vulcanus
pages.desc: {b The relish of} {fire Vulcanus}, or {b Fire}, is associated with the fierce power and all the favors from volcanoes.
